A

Add a new question, after checking to make sure it isn't already in the bank

A method that returns all answers
answersIndent() - Method in class Question
Return all answers with a, b, c, etc formatting

C

check(ArrayList<Integer>) - Method in class Quiz
Takes in the set of answers, checks them, stores those results (right = 1, wrong = 0), and returns the number of correct answers
contains(Question) - Method in class QuestionBank
Check to see if a given question is already in the bank
contains(Question) - Method in class Quiz
Check to see if Question q is in the quiz

E

equals(Question) - Method in class Question
Compare two questions to see if they're the same - avoids duplicating in lists of questions

G

Return the student full name
getRandom() - Method in class QuestionBank
Return a random question from the bank - used to make a quiz

Constructor for objects of class Question

S

T

The toString displays just the question (no answers)

Returns a string that shows the list of questions in the bank
toString() - Method in class Quiz
